title: Did American Pediatricians Issue a Statement That Transgenderism Is ‘Child Abuse’?
subtitle: It was an official-sounding but fringe group of politically motivated pediatricians who issued a statement on gender, not the respected American Academy of Pediatrics.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The U.S.'s leading group of pediatricians issued a strong statement condemning tolerance of gender dysphoria in children.
